title: Contract rights of officers
context: [ยง414-235] Contract rights of officers. (a) The appointment or election of an officer does not itself create contract rights. (b) An officer&rsquo;s removal does not affect the officer&rsquo;s contract rights, if any, with the corporation. An officer&rsquo;s resignation does not affect the corporation&rsquo;s contract rights, if any, with the officer. [L 2000, c 244, pt of ยง1]
